message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm hoping we can make a deal. To start, I'm proposing a price of $18,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I believe we can find a more reasonable price. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $16,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $15,500 for the product.
